author: glenford simon
comment: Most Important Notification,& Sound   What the hell, how your friend supposed to know they got a voice messages with no ringtones or notification sound in the settings I was surprised not to see that is this app supposed to be a beta, or just plainly forget . Please fix before I delete this app and much better UI is needed for the phone & watch please do and maybe 99 cents you can charge. Once you better this app .

author: Melissa Chew
comment: Hi I really thanks u that u create this apps . Cause currently my mum and dad are at vietnam so it's very hard for me to contact them . If I call them it will use a lot of money . And this apps make it so easily. Thanks guys ! I hope I can win the apple watch to give it to them. They are having a hard time working there ♡ thanks !
title: Clicknetwork♡

author: Dermot L
comment: Superb concept and originality. Unfortunate that searching for voz in play store does not bring up this app at top result because it is great and alot of people would absolutely love it on their watch I believe.
